page.title: 10HOME LIFE
page.content: BOARD GAMES - There are many different types of Board-games,my favourite is "Game of Life". You are given a model car and have to drive it around the board.At various points you earn money, marry, and have children. The end of the game comes when you choose retirement or millionaire's mansion. The winner is the person with the most money. PLAYGROUND GAMES - "BUDGE" is a new game. Someone is on the others have to stand on a drain or on the steps until someone budges (pushes) you off.If that happens you have to run to anotherdrain or step before the on person tags you. COMPUTER GAMES - I have a Commodore 64 but only a few games.I like Mr. Wimpy best because you have to get past flying hamburgers and walking hot dogs. You only have five lives.
